text: Eric S. Yuan (Chinese: 袁征; pinyin: Yuán Zhēng) is a Chinese-American businessman, engineer, and the CEO and Founder of Zoom Video Communications. == Education == Yuan obtained a bachelor's degree in applied mathematics with a minor in computer application from Shandong University of Science and Technology. He has master's degree in geology engineering from China University of Mining and Technology in Beijing. == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese businesspeople Category:American chief executives Category:American company founders
title: Eric Yuan
